Class StateFileSingleton

Namespace
EasySave.Models.State

EasySave.dll

Writes the real-time backup state file (state.json).

public sealed class StateFileSingleton
Inheritance
object

object.ToString()

Remarks

v1.0/v1.1 execute jobs sequentially in a single thread. Therefore we do not need locking primitives; we just keep an in-memory list and rewrite the state file atomically each time the state changes.
